Title: Establishes an employment of New York national guard and reserve members wage tax credit
Summary: Establishes a tax credit for companies that employ New York national guard and reserve members in an amount equal to fifteen hundred dollars for each national guard or reserve member employed by such employer and twenty-five hundred dollars for each national guard or reserve member employed by such employer who has completed or returned from a deployment or activation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to creating a wage tax credit for employers who employ New York national guard men and women and reservists
